## Installing R and RStudio

On the course website you will find an online workbook that will cover some useful functions in R that will help if you are cleaning data in R
This includes;
Importing data
Creating new variables
Setting values for missing data / checking for missing data
Checking for implausible values
Correcting labels / values
Sorting data
Feel free to complete this workbook in your own time. It is not assessed
